Issue.creator: ameijer
Issue.summary: Hard-Coded AWS access key id in aws.yml
Issue.description: in /cello/src/agent/ansible/vars/aws.yml, line 6 contains a hard-coded AWS access key id. This is an issue for portability, as well as a (minor) security flaw. We should change this to read the standard AWS env var 'AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID'
